subject: Steroids
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Baseball
Perjury
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Jason Giambi calmly testified on Tuesday at Barry Bonds’s perjury trial, describing the items he received from Bonds’s trainer, Greg Anderson, as if reciting items on his grocery list.
snippet: Jason Giambi calmly testified on Tuesday at Barry Bonds’s perjury trial, describing the items he received from Bonds’s trainer, Greg Anderson, as if reciting items on his grocery list.
